rooms.description: Spacious open living area with a Chettinad-style decor and modern amenities.
Fully equipped kitchen with traditional Chettinad motifs and efficient workspace.
Dedicated space for domestic help, designed for convenience and privacy.
Formal entry with ample storage and decor elements reflecting local traditions.

openings.description: Traditional wooden door with intricate detailing, aligning with Chettinad aesthetics.
Balcony access leading to a spacious balcony from the living room.
Secured pool gate for safe access to the swimming pool area.

additional_features.description: A 10x20 feet swimming pool located in the rear garden, designed with Vastu principles for proper energy flow.
Each bedroom has a dedicated spacious balcony, providing natural light and ventilation. The balconies are designed to face the east or north to align with Vastu principles.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with integrated walk-in closet and adjoining spacious balcony facing east to enhance positivity.
Guest bedroom designed for comfort, featuring a private balcony for natural light and ventilation.
Modern ensuite bathroom with traditional touches, ensuring privacy and tranquility.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting the ground floor to the upper level, incorporating open design for natural light.
Window access leading to a spacious balcony in guest bedroom area.
